description:
Wendy is a member of Team Rocket who so far has only made one appearance. She gets her revenge on Jessie by adding the Smoothie price to Jessie`s bill.
Years ago, she and Jessie trained together. One day, they were working out and got a smoothie at the Rocket Caf√©. Jessie downed Wendy`s smoothie and said "I`ll pay you back someday". Wendy never forgot this, and holds a constant grudge. She then adds the price of the smoothie to the trio`s Team Rocket bill. She refers to Giovanni as "Master".
name: Gingie
